name: Snakkke
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 31 (Theme: Entire Game on One Screen) - a simple 3D snake made in ~3 hours.

Controls:
Up Arrow - Move Forward
Down Arrow - Move Back
Left Arrow or A - Move Left
Right Arrow or D - Move Right
W - Move Up
S - Move Down
Escape - Menu

Entry page here

Music made with Circuli
Sounds made with bfxr
Used font: BubbleGum Sans
